dct_title_s: Hammond's road map of northern New Jersey
dct_description_sm: Includes enlarged inset scale map of Jersey City, Newark and vicinity, c1912 by C.S. Hammond & Co. "Based on the Surveys of the United States Geological Survey, United States Coast and Geodetic Survey, The Geological Survey of New Jersey with the Various Local Surveys, Revised and Corrected."
dct_publisher_sm: New York : C.S. Hammond & Co., c1915.
